titles.title: Honoring America's Fathers Act of 2007
To amend title 4, United States Code, to provide that it is especially appropriate to display the flag on Father's Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 5/22/2007--Introduced. Honoring America's Fathers Act of 2007 - Includes Father's Day, the third Sunday in June, as a day on which the U.S. flag should be displayed.
